languages.text: "Ты их опозорил{mf||а}, мон-кай. Мы договаривались с Кикеросс, что против тебя выйдут новички. Она решила уронить мой авторитет и натравила на тебя лучших. А ты убил{mf||а} их и уронил{mf||а} авторитет культа. Но кому интерес{mf|ен|на} жалк{mf|ий|ая} мон-кай? Ты — лишь моя пешка. Значит, это я уронил авторитет культа".

traits.locale_text: "Ты их опозорил{mf||а}, мон-кай. Мы договаривались с Кикеросс, что против тебя выйдут новички. Она решила уронить мой авторитет и натравила на тебя лучших. А ты убил{mf||а} их и уронил{mf||а} авторитет культа. Но кому интерес{mf|ен|на} жалк{mf|ий|ая} мон-кай? Ты — лишь моя пешка. Значит, это я уронил авторитет культа".

languages.text: "You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would send fresh meat against you, but she decided to undermine my authority by sending out her best. You slaughtered them, and so it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."
languages.original_text: "Ты их опозорил{mf||а}, мон-кай. Мы договаривались с Кикеросс, что против тебя выйдут новички. Она решила уронить мой авторитет и натравила на тебя лучших. А ты убил{mf||а} их и уронил{mf||а} авторитет культа. Но кому интерес{mf|ен|на} жалк{mf|ий|ая} мон-кай? Ты — лишь моя пешка. Значит, это я уронил авторитет культа".

traits.locale_text: "You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would pit fresh meat against you. She decided to undermine my authority by pitting her best. Instead, you killed them, and it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey. And therefore, it was I who affronted the Cult."

"You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would pit fresh meat against you. She decided to undermine my authority by pitting her best. Instead, you killed them, and it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey. And therefore, it was I who affronted the Cult."

"You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would send fresh meat against you, but she decided to undermine my authority by sending out her best. You slaughtered them, and so it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."

You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."

You slaughtered them, and so it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."

"You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would send fresh meat against you, but she decided to undermine my authority by sending out her best. You slaughtered them, and so it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."

languages.text: « Vous les avez humiliés, mon-keigh. Keykeross et moi avions convenu qu'elle vous ferait affronter des combattants débutants, mais elle a tenté de saper mon autorité en envoyant son meilleur élément. Vous l'avez massacré et ainsi mis à mal l'image du Culte. Mais qui se soucie {mf|d'un|d'une} pathétique mon-keigh ? Vous faites partie de mes laquais, je suis donc considéré comme responsable de cette humiliation. »
languages.original_text: "You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would send fresh meat against you, but she decided to undermine my authority by sending out her best. You slaughtered them, and so it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."

traits.locale_text: « Vous les avez humiliés, mon-keigh. Keykeross et moi avions convenu qu'elle vous ferait affronter des combattants débutants, mais elle a tenté de saper mon autorité en envoyant son meilleur élément. Vous l'avez massacré et ainsi mis à mal l'image du Culte. Mais qui se soucie {mf|d'un|d'une} pathétique mon-keigh ? Vous faites partie de mes laquais, je suis donc considéré comme responsable de cette humiliation. »

languages.text: “因为你羞辱了他们，猴子。绮克萝丝和我说好了，说她会派她的活畜来对付你，但她实际上派来的却是她最出色的战士。她本打算杀了你来让我蒙辱，可你杀光了那些人，巫灵教派的权威也因此受损。不过，谁会在乎微不足道的猴子呢？你是我的手下，因此在他们眼里，我才是破坏教派权威的罪魁祸首。”
languages.original_text: "You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would send fresh meat against you, but she decided to undermine my authority by sending out her best. You slaughtered them, and so it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."

traits.locale_text: “因为你羞辱了他们，猴子。绮克萝丝和我说好了，说她会派她的活畜来对付你，但她实际上派来的却是她最出色的战士。她本打算杀了你来让我蒙辱，可你杀光了那些人，巫灵教派的权威也因此受损。不过，谁会在乎微不足道的猴子呢？你是我的手下，因此在他们眼里，我才是破坏教派权威的罪魁祸首。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt sie erniedrigt, Chem-Pan-Sey. Keykeross und ich haben uns darauf geeinigt, dass sie frisches Fleisch gegen Euch in den Kampf schickt, doch sie hat entschieden, meine Autorität zu untergraben, indem sie ihre Besten schickt. Diese habt Ihr niedergemetzelt, daher hat nicht meine Autorität gelitten, sondern die des Kults. Aber wen schert schon ein erbärmlicher Chem-Pan-Sey? Ihr seid mein Lakai, daher war ICH es, der die Autorität des Kults untergraben hat."
languages.original_text: "You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would send fresh meat against you, but she decided to undermine my authority by sending out her best. You slaughtered them, and so it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt sie erniedrigt, Chem-Pan-Sey. Keykeross und ich haben uns darauf geeinigt, dass sie frisches Fleisch gegen Euch in den Kampf schickt, doch sie hat entschieden, meine Autorität zu untergraben, indem sie ihre Besten schickt. Diese habt Ihr niedergemetzelt, daher hat nicht meine Autorität gelitten, sondern die des Kults. Aber wen schert schon ein erbärmlicher Chem-Pan-Sey? Ihr seid mein Lakai, daher war ICH es, der die Autorität des Kults untergraben hat."

languages.text: «Los has humillado, mon-keigh. Keykeross y yo coincidíamos en que debías enfrentarte a principiantes, pero prefirió desautorizarme enviando a sus mejores luchadores. Pero como has acabado con ellos, es la autoridad del culto la que se ha visto comprometida. Aun así, ¿a quién le va a importar un insignificante mon-keigh? Me sirves a mí, por lo que yo soy el responsable de socavar la autoridad del culto».
languages.original_text: "You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would send fresh meat against you, but she decided to undermine my authority by sending out her best. You slaughtered them, and so it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."

traits.locale_text: «Los has humillado, mon-keigh. Keykeross y yo coincidíamos en que debías enfrentarte a principiantes, pero prefirió desautorizarme enviando a sus mejores luchadores. Pero como has acabado con ellos, es la autoridad del culto la que se ha visto comprometida. Aun así, ¿a quién le va a importar un insignificante mon-keigh? Me sirves a mí, por lo que yo soy el responsable de socavar la autoridad del culto».

languages.text: 「お前は彼らに恥をかかせたんだ、モン＝ケイ。キーケロスと私は、彼女からお前に新鮮な肉を送り込むことで合意したのに、彼女は自分が持つ最高の戦士を送り込むことで、私の権威を貶めようと企んだ。お前は、やつらを皆殺しにし、魔女団の権威がその痛手を被った。だが哀れなモン＝ケイだど誰が気にする？お前は私の下僕だ。従って魔女団の権威を貶めた責任は私にあるのだ」
languages.original_text: "You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would send fresh meat against you, but she decided to undermine my authority by sending out her best. You slaughtered them, and so it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は彼らに恥をかかせたんだ、モン＝ケイ。キーケロスと私は、彼女からお前に新鮮な肉を送り込むことで合意したのに、彼女は自分が持つ最高の戦士を送り込むことで、私の権威を貶めようと企んだ。お前は、やつらを皆殺しにし、魔女団の権威がその痛手を被った。だが哀れなモン＝ケイだど誰が気にする？お前は私の下僕だ。従って魔女団の権威を貶めた責任は私にあるのだ」

languages.text: "Onları aşağıladın mon-keigh. Keykeross ve ben, sana taze et göndereceği konusunda anlaşmıştık. O ise elindeki en iyileri göndererek otoritemi sarsmaya karar verdi. Sen sadece onları katletmedin, Tarikat'ın otoritesine de zarar verdin. Fakat ezik bir mon-keigh kimin umurunda? Sen benim ayakçımsın, dolayısıyla Tarikat'ın otoritesini sarsmış olmanın sorumluluğu bana ait."
languages.original_text: "You humiliated them, mon-keigh. Keykeross and I agreed that she would send fresh meat against you, but she decided to undermine my authority by sending out her best. You slaughtered them, and so it was the Cult's authority that suffered. But who cares about a pathetic mon-keigh? You are my lackey and thus it is I who is responsible for undermining the Cult's authority."

traits.locale_text: "Onları aşağıladın mon-keigh. Keykeross ve ben, sana taze et göndereceği konusunda anlaşmıştık ama o, elindeki en iyileri göndererek otoritemi sarsmaya karar verdi. Sen sadece onları katletmedin, Tarikat'ın otoritesine de zarar verdin. Ama ezik bir mon-keigh kimin umurunda? Sen benim ayakçımsın, dolayısıyla Tarikat'ın otoritesini sarsmış olmanın sorumluluğu bana ait."
